response.overview: "It's not that I feel like a slave, we are mentally enslaved. We're slaved to brands, a Benz symbol, we're enslaved to chains. I'm tired of hearing about brands. Let's talk about humanity and how we can help each other out as a people. Why can't we start the conversation with love? Why don't we start the conversation with God? Why don't we start the conversation with Family?"
response.title: Kanye West's New Testament
